title: Automatic Image Segmentation for Lung using Deep Learning and Convolutional Neural Network
authors: Utsav Dharani, Dhara Bambhroliya, Aayushi Lad, Vivin Meveda, Riya Gohil
venue: Grenze International Journal of Engineering and Technology
pdf: /papers/Automatic Image Segmentation for Lung using DeepLearning and Convolutional Neural Network.pdf
summary: U-Net based lung segmentation on chest X-rays to support faster, more reliable image analysis and verification workflows.
bullets: Prepared ~800 chest X-ray images (704 labeled); resized to 256Ã—256 and converted to grayscale for efficiency.
Implemented U-Net for semantic segmentation and evaluated quality using Dice coefficient and Jaccard index.
Reported training/validation behavior across 100 epochs and discussed failure cases like occlusion and deformation.
